title: UART Component Definition
description: A UART WipperSnapper component for use in Adafruit IO

displayName.description: The human-friendly name of this sensor.

type.description: A unique string used to look up this sensor's definition, and its parent component's definition.

sensorType.description: One of the supported I2C sensor type strings (found in README).

defaultPeriod.description: What period to the form should default to for this sensor.

displayName.description: The human-friendly name of this component.

published.description: If True, this component is supported by the current firmware version and will be displayed to all users. Otherwise, it is hidden behind a developer toggle so that contributors can still work on it against the production site.

description.description: A brief description describing this component's capabilities.

vendor.description: Name of the company that makes this component.

subcomponents.description: List of sensor subcomponents comprising the primary UART component.

baudRate.description: The desired UART bus baud rate, in bps.

inverted.description: When True, this component will invert TX/RX signals on the UART bus.
